description.p: This tradition focuses on channeling kinetic energy offensively, granting the Monk's versatile abilities to unleash devastating attacks in combat.

At 3rd level, spend 1 Kinetic Charge to unleash a Kinetic Blast. One target within range must succeed on a Strength saving throw (DC = 8 + proficiency bonus + Strength modifier) or take 2d6 force damage + Dexterity modifier and be pushed 10 ft. Damage increases at levels 5, 11, 17.

At 6th level, spend 2 Kinetic Charges to make two consecutive unarmed strikes. If either hits, trigger a 5-ft radius kinetic explosion: primary target takes 2d8 + Dex modifier, others take 1d8. Damage increases at 11th and 17th levels.

At 13th level, once per long rest, spend 3 Kinetic Charges to push targets in a 20-ft radius away. Each target must succeed on a Strength saving throw or take 3d10 force damage, be pushed 10 ft, and fall prone. On success, half damage and not pushed.
